successfulDelete.title: Successfully Deleted!
successfulDelete.desc: I've successfully deleted your friend code! You can set it again by typing `.fc set <code>`!

noCode.title: No Code Found!
noCode.s: You have not set a friend code! You can do so by running `.fc set <code>`!
noCode.u: has not set their friend code!

unknownMember.title: Unknown Member!
unknownMember.desc: Could not find a member by that name!

none.title: No Island Name Given!
none.desc: Please supply the name of your island!

invalid.title: Invalid Island Name!
invalid.desc: Island names cannot be longer than 10 characters!

success.title: Successfully set the name of your island!

clear.title: Successfully cleared the name of your island!
clear.desc: To set your island name again, use `.island islandname <name>`!

none.title: No Fruit Given!
none.desc: Please supply the name of the fruit that is native to your island!

invalid.title: Invalid Fruit!
invalid.desc: Your island's native fruit must be one of apples, cherries, oranges, peaches, or pears!

success.title: Successfully set your island's native fruit!

clear.title: Successfully cleared your island's native fruit!
clear.desc: To set your island's native fruit again, use `.island fruit <fruit>`!

none.title: No Character Name Given!
none.desc: Please supply the name of your character!

invalid.title: Invalid Character Name!
invalid.desc: Character names cannot be longer than 10 characters!

clear.title: Successfully cleared your character's name!
clear.desc: To set your character's name again, use `.island charactername <name>`!

none.title: No Hemisphere Given!
none.desc: Please supply the hemisphere your island is in, either northern or southern!

invalid.title: Invalid Hemisphere!
invalid.desc: The hemisphere must be either northern or southern!

success.title: Successfully set the hemisphere for your island!

clear.title: Successfully cleared the hemisphere for your island!
clear.desc: To set the hemisphere for your island again, use `.island hemisphere <hemisphere>`!

none.title: No Switch Profile Name Given!

invalid.desc: Switch profile names cannot be longer than 10 characters!

success.title: Successfully set your Switch profile name!

clear.title: Successfully cleared your Switch profile name!
clear.desc: To set your Switch profile name again, use `.island profilename <name>`!

success.title: Successfully set your Switch friend code!

clear.title: Successfully cleared your Switch friend code!
clear.desc: To set your Switch friend code again, use `.island friendcode <code>`!

invalid.title: Too long!
invalid.desc: Your bio is longer than 240 characters, or it has a word that's too long. Please change it!

clear.title: Successfully cleared your bio!
clear.desc: To set your bio again, use `.profile bio <bio>`!

invalid.title: Invalid background!
invalid.desc: Your background must either be an image

clear.title: Successfully cleared your bio!
clear.desc: To set your bio again, use `.profile bio <bio>`!

none.title: No Value To Remove!
none.desc: Please supply the value you would like to remove! (islandname/fruit/charactername/hemisphere/profilename/friendcode/all)

invalid.title: Invalid Value To Remove!
invalid.desc: Please supply the value you would like to remove! (islandname/fruit/charactername/hemisphere/profilename/friendcode/all)

success.title: Successfully cleared your island information!
success.desc: To set your island information again, use `.island (islandname/fruit/charactername/hemisphere/profilename/friendcode) <info>`!

noMod.title: Island Settings Not Moderated!
noMod.desc: The prompt timed out, or you selected no.

invalid.title: Invalid Member!
invalid.desc: Please mention a valid member of this server to moderate their island settings!

invalid.title: Unknown Member!
invalid.desc: Could not find a member by that name!

search.none: There's nothing here... Use `.island (bio/islandname/fruit/charactername/hemisphere/profilename/friendcode) <info>` to write information here!

none.title: No Matches!
none.desc: No emojis matched your search critera!

top.title: Not a Number!
top.desc: You must supply a number for the amount of top ranked emojis to display.

bottom.title: Not a Number!
bottom.desc: You must supply a number for the amount of bottom ranked emojis to display

more.title: Not a Number!
more.desc: You must supply a number for the minimum amount of uses an emoji must have to be displayed.

less.title: Not a Number!
less.desc: You must supply a number for the maximum amount of uses an emoji must have to be displayed.

offset.title: Invalid Numbers!
offset.desc: The numbers provided must be greater than 0.

search.title: Invalid Usage!
search.desc: You used this command incorrectly! Use `.help emojistats` for details on how to use this command.

raid.raidAnnouncement:
**Raid Ongoing**!
We're sorry to inconvenience everyone, but we've restricted all message sending capabilities due to a suspected raid. Don't worry though, you'll be back to chatting about your favorite game in no time, yes yes!
raid.raidEnded:
**Raid Mode Has Been Lifted**!
We've determined that it's safe to lift raid mode precautions and allow everyone to send messages again! Channels should open up again immediately, yes yes!

banned.title: Banning!
banned.desc: has chosen to ban the raid. It may take some time to finish banning all raid members.

up.title: Congratulations,
up.descL: You just leveled up to rank **
up.descR: **! Keep talking to unlock new levels and rewards!

none.title: Not enough arguments!
none.desc: You must supply a role and permission level to edit or add! The correct usage is `.addperm <role name> <role level>`, like `.addperm blue rose mod`

invalid.title: Couldn't find role!
invalid.desc: Sorry, I couldn't find a role by that name! Could you try using the role's ID instead?

newPermission.title: Couldn't find permission level!
newPermission.desc: Couldn't find a permission level by that name! Would you like to add a new one? If so, what's the numeric level (0-10, with 0 being unverified)? Say cancel if you don't want to.

updated.title: Permissions updated!
updated.desc: is now granted the following permission level:

cancel.title: Cancelled!
cancel.desc: This role won't have a permission level added to it!

newSuccess.title: New level added!
newSuccess.desc: is now granted the new permission level:

none.title: Invalid number of arguments!
none.desc: Please mention the new role and say the number of points needed to reach it!

noRole.title: Couldn't find that role!
noRole.desc: Please @mention the role so I can find it!

noPoints.title: No points!
noPoints.desc: Please supply the minimum needed points to achieve the role!

success.title: Success!
success.desc: Successfully added the new role to the rank database!

thanks.title: Thanks for the message!
thanks.desc: I've forwarded it to the mods and will let you know as soon as someone answers!

none.title: No Message!
none.desc: You need to write a message to go with your modmail, please try again!

dm.title: Hello!
dm.desc: Was this supposed to be a modmail? Don't worry, I've saved your message, so just tell me which category your modmail falls into!

modmail.title: Just one more step!
modmail.desc: In the name of organization, which category does your modmail fall into?

scam.name: Scam Report
scam.title: Thanks for the report!
scam.desc: Catching scammers is very important for us, and we're really sorry you had to go through that! Our team will being investigating this as soon as possible!

report.name: Report Rule-Breaking
report.title: Thanks for the report!
report.desc: We'll start investigating this as soon as possible!

suggestion.name: Suggestion
suggestion.title: Thanks for the suggestion!
suggestion.desc: We're always striving to improve our server, and will definitely take this into consideration!

question.name: Question
question.title: Good question!
question.desc: We'll answer it as soon as we can!

other.name: Other
other.title: Thanks for the message!
other.desc: We'll take a look at it as soon as possible and reply if needed!

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.title: Cancelled!
cancel.desc: No worries, I've already deleted your message from my memory!

tags.usage: Use '.t name' to show a tag

noEdit.title: Cannot Edit!
noEdit.desc: You do not have permission to edit tags!

noName.title: No Tag Name!
noName.desc: Make sure you include a tag name!

noContent.title: No Tag Content!
noContent.desc: Make sure you include the content for the tag!

reserved.title: Reserved Word!
reserved.desc: You can't use this word for tags!

notFound.title: Tag Does Not Exist!
notFound.desc: The tag you attempted to display does not exist!

beesting.appeal: If you wish to contact the moderators about this punishment, please use the .appeal command here.
beesting.mute: You have been temporarily muted for
beesting.ban: You have been banned from All things garden!

filters.imageOnly:
Image Only Channel!
This channel only allows posts with images or links in them. Everything else is automatically deleted.
filters.newlineLimit:
Too Many New Lines!
This channel only allows posts with less than 10 newline characters in them. Messages with more than that are automatically deleted.
filters.attachmentLimit:
Too Many Attachments + Links!
This channel only allows posts with less than 3 attachments + links in them. Messages with more than that are automatically deleted.
filters.noMention:
No Mention Channel!
This channel is to be kept clear of @ mentions of any members. Any message mentioning another member will be automatically deleted.
filters.cursing:
No cursing allowed!
You can't curse in this channel, please keep it PG-13!

back.footer: You can go back anytime using the ‚óÄÔ∏è reaction!

start.title: Yuecrossing's Garden Layout Decisions
start.desc: Hello! You know what's best for your garden, but I'd be happy to help! Would you kindly tell me your objective?

cloning.title: 🧬 Cloning
cloning.desc: You want more of the flowers you already have

breeding.title: 💐 Breeding
breeding.desc: You know which flowers you want and how to get them

testing.title: 🧪 Testing
testing.desc: You want to know your flower's genotype

all.title: ‚öúÔ∏è All Flowers
all.desc: You want every single flower variation in the game!

cliffs.title: Do you mind cliffs?
cliffs.desc: Using cliffs is the most space-efficient way to achieve your goals! They are extremely space-efficient. The downside, other than aesthetics, is that you need to keep going up and down the cliffs to water your flowers, will need more watering can uses, some guests won't want to water your flowers, and you'll have to keep spare ladders in case a waterer didn't expect you to use these layouts. With that in mind, would you use cliffs or not?

species.title: Number of species
species.desc: How many flower species are you working with? Remember, we're talking about species, not color variations!

visitors.title: How popular are you?
visitors.desc: The more people water your flowers, the more likely they are to produce new flowers! (this caps at five visitors). How many people are you planning on inviting to your island to water your flowers each day?

parents.title: Parents
parents.desc: Are the flowers you're trying to breed identical, or of different colors?

identical.title: 👯 Identical
identical.desc: Although they might have a different genotype, their color is the same

different.title: ‚ùÑÔ∏è Different
different.desc: They're of the same species, but not the same color.

space.title: Available space
space.desc: How much space do you have for your flowers? The ideal layout needs lots of space, but that might not be an option for you.

lotsSpace.title: 🪐 Lots!
lotsSpace.desc: You have a good chunk of your island reserved for flowers.

fewSpace.title: 🏬 Not Much
fewSpace.desc: You have a happy little garden, emphasis on little.

jmaster.title: J_MASTER's 12x12
jmaster.desc:
Pay attention to each zone! First, plant all flowers marked with the seed icon. They must be planted from seeds, you can't get them from anywhere else! Once that's done, water (and get visitors to water) your flowers everyday. In zone 1, except for the white roses, as soon as a flower couple breeds one of the flowers marked with a star in zone 2, move them to zone 2. The white roses must be children of the yellow and white rose couple.

Now that you're in zone 2, once again, as soon as a couple produces a flower marked with a yellow star in zone 3, move them to zone 3. The exception is purple roses! When your purple/white couple has produced a purple rose, you need to keep the child apart and breed it with seed yellow roses. If they produce a yellow rose, the purple rose can proceed to zone 3. Once you get both purple and orange roses in zone 3, breed them until you get an orange rose, and move it to zone 4. Now all your zones are ready!

If you get five visitors to water your garden every day, this can take as little as 13 days! It can take 9 days if you double the layout as well (it's still less space than the 'A Lot!' option).

You can remove couples that already gave you all wanted hybrids if you want to conserve watering cans or space.

Not depicted in the image are the endgame hybrids: in zone 2, orange cosmos make black; orange/yellow tulips make purple; and orange/yellow hyacinths make purple. In zone 3, red windflowers make purple, red pansies make purple, and purple mums make green. In zone 4, red/orange windflowers make pink, red/white mums make pink, red/yellow pansies make orange, red lilies make black and pink, red/yellow lilies make orange, red roses make black and pink, red tulips make black, red/white tulips make pink, red/white hyacinths make pink, white hyacinths make blue, orange roses make blue, and red/white cosmos make pink.

backwards.title: BackwardsN's 39x21
backwards.desc:
You should plant the following flowers from seeds (you can't get them from anywhere else, they must be from seeds!):

40 White pansies, the 18 red pansies that will be next to blue and yellow pansies, 9 yellow pansies, 40 white windflowers, 21 red windflowers, 9 orange windflowers, 36 red lilies, 4 yellow lilies, 9 red mums, 9 yellow mums, 12 red cosmos, 12 yellow cosmos, 12 red tulips, the 12 yellow tulips next to them, 9 red hyacinths, the 9 yellow hyacinths next to them, 12 white roses, and the 12 red roses next to them.

Every red-only square is made of hybrids, and same for every orange square. Additionally, the yellow mum square is also made of hybrids. The yellow/red rose and pansy square has red hybrids.

The order of planting roses is important. First, plant the orange-red-white rose/windflower square with seeds. Then, move all red rose children to the yellow/red rose/pansy square. Then, move their red children to the red rose square. Their children should be moved to the black/orange/red rose square.

offsetDenseIP.title: Offset Dense Isolated Pairs
offsetDenseIP.desc: Leave a column of space at each end, especially if you have lots of visitors watering your flowers.

doubleDiamonds.title: Dense Diamonds
doubleDiamonds.desc: 4.5% more efficient than Isolated Pairs if you have no visitors, but not very space efficient. You need to be extra careful with the placement of your flowers, so pay attention to the chart!
